name: 3rd Scopus-Indexed Springer International Conference on Computer Networks, Big Data and IoT
content: The realization of integration of IoT and Big data in computer networks is forming a revolutionary paradigm in Information and Communication technologies \[ICT\] to enable a smart and self-configurable intelligent devices in this smart infrastructure. Smart IoT and big data platform allows the networked devices to communicate along with the core values of volume, variety and velocity which in turn leads to the integration of Big data and IoT with advanced machine learning and other advanced techniques. This International Conference on Computer networks, Big Data and IoT \[ICCBI 2020\] will provide an interdisciplinary platform to bring together scientists, researchers and academicians to present and exchange the ideas of the latest research works and results related to IoT, big data and computer networking topics.
